ValidationRule.description: All Claim Photos must be attached prior to Submitting a Claim.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( TEXT(Origin) = 'Owner', TEXT(Origin) = 'Contractor', TEXT(Origin) = 'Distributor' ), OR( RecordType.Name = 'Commercial Claim', RecordType.Name = 'Residential Claim' ), TEXT( Claim_Stage__c ) = 'Submitted', NOT( All_Claim_Photos_Attached__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please make sure All Claims Photos are attached prior to submitting a Claim (tick the box 'All Claim Photos Attached?' when this is the case).
